x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/structuredefinition-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/StructureDefinition \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"StructureDefinition","id":"5c122ea7-27ce-4366-b437-d73870b725d3","url":"http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/example-composition","name":"DocumentStructure","title":"Document Structure (For testing section templates)","status":"active","experimental":false,"date":"2018-11-05T14:47:00+08:00","kind":"complex-type","abstract":false,"type":"Composition","baseDefinition":"http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition","derivation":"constraint","differential":{"element":[{"path":"Composition"},{"path":"Composition.section","slicing":{"discriminator":[{"type":"pattern","path":"code"}],"description":"Slice by .section.code","ordered":true,"rules":"closed"}},{"path":"Composition.section","sliceName":"procedure","min":1,"type":[{"code":"BackboneElement","profile":["http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/document-section-library"]}]},{"path":"Composition.section","sliceName":"medications","min":1,"type":[{"code":"BackboneElement","profile":["http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/document-section-library"]}]},{"path":"Composition.section","sliceName":"plan","min":0,"type":[{"code":"BackboneElement","profile":["http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/document-section-library"]}]}]},"meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.552+08:00"}}'
x-codeSamples.label: cURL
